comments.raw_text:
TO REPRODUCE:

Make sure you have two two spaces.

On the first space, create a Firefox window and move it to the right side of the screen. Move some of the window off screen.

Use the three-finger swipe to move to the space to the right.

RESULTS:

Observe part of the Firefox window appear and disappear while moving between spaces. Lots of flickering.

The hidden part of the window should never appear: spaces do not work as multiple monitors do.

It is much worse with a page where a flash video is playing. But I don't think this is a flash issue.
comments.creator: sarentz@mozilla.com
